column3: Specifies that parameters are to be derived from the named job file. To run /job:jobname you must first run the /save:jobname parameter to create the job file
Specifies that parameters are to be saved to the named job file. This must be ran before running /job:jobname. All copy retr and logging options must be specified before this parameter
Quits after processing command line (to view parameters
Indicates that no source directory is specified.
Indicates that no destination directory is specified.
